Reviews.Title: Shtap
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: The back to it is all scratched up, there's this grey bar at the top of the screen that won't go away and hides the time, there is no sim card, and no headphones will work in it, meaning the piece in it is all jacked up.

Reviews.Title: Perfect deal
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: Received the product just as described, easily unlocked, works fine with my old cell phone chip.I use it in Brazil with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Best almost like a new One
Reviews.Author: Sandyp
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Phone kind of used one, But surprised to seee that its almost New, everything so perfect that i am buying another one from the same seller. I love it.

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: JOSE
Reviews.Content: I use Net10 on this Iphone The ongly thing I did not like it mosty was no mms After JailBreak it I got it but I hate also was it was on 3.1.3 Update that means the App Store won't let u download any app on the Iphone 2g when I wen't to WhiteDoor to update it to Ios 6 on it It said did not work at all I try to get the same apps Like my Android fone I love to play games sometimes But the app store said it needed 4.3 on some apps or higher I like it still 1 of my Favorite Iphone ever but It would be much better on Ios 6 or lower but not 3.1.3 old software update
